## Description {#details}

A struct of argument use: a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> and the offset it accesses.

This struct is to track uses inside function via GEP. If GEP has a non-constant index, the Offset field is nullopt.

Definition at line 589 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
